snippet: Some students suspected in a cheating scandal have opted for a leave of absence rather than face possible suspension.
abstract: Some of the Harvard University students suspected in a cheating scandal, facing academic and financial deadlines, decide to take a leave of absence rather than face possible suspension for a year.
lead_paragraph: Some students suspected in a cheating scandal have opted for a leave of absence rather than face possible suspension.

headline.seo: Harvard Cheating Suspects Go on Leave
headline.main: At Harvard, Suspects in Cheating Take a Leave
headline.print_headline: At Harvard, Suspects In Cheating Take a Leave
